Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm coming in, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been taking a look around town,
and it seems you've completed all the
tasks I listed under Town Restoration.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will you come out with me for a while?
Don't worry, we're not going too far.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great, we've arrived. Take a look!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Surprised? We've all gathered here to
celebrate your outstanding hard work,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You've done a great deal. You should be
proud.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today is all about you! Shall we walk a
little closer?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone, can I have some quiet please?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There was a time when all of the young
people left this town, the shops closed,
many people left...
<PAGE>
But thanks to the arrival of <MYNAME>,
the number of shops have increased, and
we now have real craftsmen living here.
<PAGE>
It's finally a place where young people
can find a future for themselves once
more!
<PAGE>
I am so happy to be able to say that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME> has given us the unbending will,
the bravery required to do this!
<PAGE>
Holding on to these feelings will be the
key to continuing the development of our
town, making it even more glorious!
<PAGE>
I would now like to honor <MYNAME>, who
has made all of this possible, with the
Toast of the Town Trophy!
<PAGE>
I also want to give <MYNAME> the chance to
give our town a new name! Are we all in
agreement?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, all of you! So, <MYNAME>.
Please turn and face me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is from all of us. Please accept
the Toast of the Town Trophy!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you also like to give the town a
new name?
Yes
No

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN>! That's a wonderful name.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's fine as it is? I'm glad to hear
you've grown to love the original name
of our town.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right! We're celebrating today! Let's
party into the night!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've also got some fireworks. Let's all
have a good time!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. This town has come
back to life because of you.
<PAGE>
Please continue to champion our town in
the future.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That takes care of the formalities,
anyway! Now please enjoy the rest of
this celebration.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This way, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's not the way we normally appear?
Come on, who cares about that?
<PAGE>
We're here to celebrate with you!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't mind her, she's just a little
embarrassed!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
As if!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>! All the people
in the town are really happy, thanks to
you!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, you have done quite well. I guess
I can give you a little praise, too.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We aren't the only ones here to thank
you! The Harvest Goddess is here too!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA! Well done, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You really are something else, aren't
you? Look how big the town has become!
<PAGE>
It makes me proud to be the Goddess of
this region. The boss is really happy.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Amazing! Even the Harvest Goddess is
singing your praises.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's enough for today, anyway.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Keep on working hard for the town,
<MYNAME>. You have my eternal gratitude.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey! What're you doing over here all
alone? Come and join us!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Go and enjoy the party, <MYNAME>. This is
all for your benefit, after all.
Today was a lot of fun... time for bed.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN> okay as the new name?
Yes
No

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <GREEN>Echo Village</GREEN> okay as the name
of the town?
